SEARCH
Package org.pizzeria.state

Class State

java.lang.Object
org.pizzeria.state.State
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class State extends Object implements Serializable
Class representing state of the pizzeria ordering system. It contains queues for orders and storage.
